title: "Dr Mandy Lauw Reviews YoungEHA, AI, and Ethics in Hematology at EHA2022"
excerpt: "Mandy Lauw, MD, PhD, physician scientist and chair of the YoungEHA committee, discussed the content presented at the YoungEHA Research Meeting at the 2022 European Hematology Association (EHA) Congress and core themes of the session she cochaired on the ethics of artificial intelligence (AI) and science in hematology."
